Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: jab aasamaan phat jaega
aur apane paravaradigaar ka hukm baja laega aur use vaajib bhee yahee hai
aur jab zameen (baraabar karake) taan dee jaegee
aur jo kuchh usamen hai ugal degee aur bilkul khaalee ho jaegee
aur apane paravaradigaar ka hukm baja laegee
aur us par laazim bhee yahee hai (to qayaamat aa jaegee) ai insaan too apane paravaradigaar kee huzooree kee koshish karata hai
to too (ek na ek din) usake saamane haazir hoga phir (us din) jisaka naamae aamaal usake daahine haath mein diya jaega
usase to hisaab aasaan tareeke se liya jaega
aur (phir) vah apane (momineen ke) qabeele kee taraph khush khush palatega
lekin jis shakhsh ko usaka naame aamal usakee peeth ke peechhe se diya jaega
vah to maut kee dua karega
aur jahannum vaasil hoga
ye shakhsh to apane ladake baalon mein mast rahata tha
aur samajhata tha ki kabhee (khuda kee taraph) phir kar jaega hee nahin
haan usaka paravaradigaar yaqeenee usako dekh bhaal kar raha hai
to mujhe shaam kee murkhee kee qasam
aur raat kee aur un cheezon kee jinhen ye dhaank letee hai
aur chaand kee jab poora ho jae
ki tum log zaroor ek sakhtee ke baad doosaree sakhtee mein phansoge
to un logon ko kya ho gaya hai ki eemaan nahin eemaan nahin laate
aur jab unake saamane quraan padha jaata hai to (khuda ka) sajada nahin karate (21) (sajada)
balki kaafir log to (aur use) jhuthalaate hain
aur jo baaten ye log apane dilon mein chhipaate hain khuda use khoob jaanata hai
to (ai rasool) unhen dardanaak azaab kee khushakhabaree de do
magar jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe achchhe kaam kie unake lie beintiha ajr (va savaab hai)
burzon vaale aasamaanon kee qasam
aur us din kee jisaka vaayada kiya gaya hai
aur gavaah kee aur jisakee gavaahee de jaegee
usakee (ki kuphfaar makka halaak hue) jis tarah khandaq vaale halaak kar die gae
jo khandaqen aag kee theen
jisamen (unhonne musalamaanon ke lie) eendhan jhonk rakha tha
jab vah un (khandaqon) par baithe hue aur jo sulook eemaanadaaron ke saath karate the usako saamane dekh rahe the
aur unako momineen kee yahee baat buree maaloom huee ki vah log khuda par eemaan lae the jo zabaradast aur sazaavaar hamd hai
vah (khuda) jisakee saare aasamaan zameen mein baadashaahat hai aur khuda har cheez se vaaqif hai
beshak jin logon ne eemaanadaar mardon aur auraton ko takaleephen deen phir tauba na kee unake lie jahannum ka azaab to hai hee (isake alaava) jalane ka bhee azaab hoga
beshak jo log eemaan lae aur achchhe kaam karate rahe unake lie vah baagaat hain jinake neeche naharen jaaree hain yahee to badee kaamayaabee hai
beshak tumhaare paravaradigaar kee pakad bahut sakht hai
vahee pahalee dafa paida karata hai aur vahee dobaara (qayaamat mein zinda) karega
aur vahee bada bakhshane vaala mohabbat karane vaala hai
arsh ka maalik bada aaleeshaan hai
jo chaahata hai karata hai
kya tumhaare paas lashakaron kee khabar pahunchee hai
(yaani) phiraun va samood kee (zaroor pahunchee hai)
magar kuphfaar to jhuthalaane hee (kee fikr) mein hain
aur khuda unako peechhe se ghere hue hai (ye jhuthalaane ke qaabil nahin)
balki ye to quraan majeed hai
jo lauhe mahaphooz mein likha hua hai
aasamaan aur raat ko aane vaale kee qasam
aur tumako kya maaloom raat ko aane vaala kya hai
(vah) chamakata hua taara hai
(is baat kee qasam) ki koee shakhsh aisa nahin jis par nigehabaan muqarrar nahin
to insaan ko dekhana chaahie ki vah kis cheez se paida hua hain
vah uchhalate hue paanee (manee) se paida hua hai
jo peeth aur seene kee haddiyon ke beech mein se nikalata hai
beshak khuda usake dobaara (paida) karane par zaroor kudarat rakhata hai
jis din dilon ke bhed jaanche jaenge
to (us din) usaka na kuchh zor chalega aur na koee madadagaar hoga
chakkar (khaane) vaale aasamaan kee qasam
aur phatane vaalee (zameen kee qasam)
beshak ye quraan qaule faisal hai
aur lago nahin hai
beshak ye kuphfaar apanee tadabeer kar rahe hain
aur main apanee tadbeer kar raha hoon
to kaafiron ko mohalat do bas unako thodee see mohalat do
